languages.text: {n}Иокаста дарит сжавшемуся Зику звериную, в кровоточащих порезах улыбку.{/n} "Слышал, отребье? Для тебя еще ничего не закончено. Теперь ты мой, так что постарайся петь сладко про своего Немезита, и, может, заработаешь легкую смерть".

{n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста дарит сжавшемуся Зику звериную, в кровоточащих порезах улыбку.{/n} "Слышал, отребье? Для тебя еще ничего не закончено. Теперь ты мой, так что постарайся петь сладко про своего Немезита, и, может, заработаешь легкую смерть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta gives cowering Zeke a bestial, bloody smile..{/n} "Did you hear this, scum? Nothing is over for you yet. You are mine now, so try to sing sweetly about your Nemesite, and you may earn an easy death yet."

{n}Jocasta gives cowering Zeke a bestial, bloody smile..{/n} "Did you hear this, scum? Nothing is over for you yet. You are mine now, so try to sing sweetly about your Nemesite, and you may earn an easy death yet."

{n}Jocasta flashes the cowering Zeke a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, scum? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

{n}Jocasta flashes the cowering Zeke a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, scum? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

{n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

{n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback lächelt Ziek blutrünstig an.{/n} "Habt Ihr das gehört, Abschaum? Noch ist es für Euch nicht vorbei. Ihr gehört jetzt mir, also fangt Ihr besser an, süß über Euren Nemesit zu singen. Vielleicht gewähre ich Euch dann einen leichten Tod."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback lächelt Ziek blutrünstig an.{/n} "Habt Ihr das gehört, Abschaum? Noch ist es für Euch nicht vorbei. Ihr gehört jetzt mir, also fangt Ihr besser an, süß über Euren Nemesit zu singen. Vielleicht gewähre ich Euch dann einen leichten Tod."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback muestra una sonrisa sanguinaria a Ziek.{/n} «¿Has oído eso, perro? Todavía no hemos terminado contigo. Ahora eres mío, así que más te vale escupir todo lo que sabes de tu adorado Nemesitio. Igual así hasta te ganas una muerte rápida».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback muestra una sonrisa sanguinaria a Ziek.{/n} «¿Has oído eso, perro? Todavía no hemos terminado contigo. Ahora eres mío, así que más te vale escupir todo lo que sabes de tu adorado Nemesitio. Igual así hasta te ganas una muerte rápida».

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックはジークにギラリとした笑みを向ける。{/n}「聞いたか、哀れな奴だ。まだ終わってないぞ。お前はもう私のものだ。だから、せいぜいネメサイトを甘く歌うんだな。まだ楽に死ねるかもしれんぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックはジークにギラリとした笑みを向ける。{/n}「聞いたか、哀れな奴だ。まだ終わってないぞ。お前はもう私のものだ。だから、せいぜいネメサイトを甘く歌うんだな。まだ楽に死ねるかもしれんぞ」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克对齐耶克露出了嗜血的笑容。{/n}“你听到了吗，渣滓？这一切对你来说还没完呢。你已经落在我手里了，所以你最好努力‘歌颂’一下你那位涅墨斯特，我说不定会让你死得痛快些。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克对齐耶克露出了嗜血的笑容。{/n}“你听到了吗，渣滓？这一切对你来说还没完呢。你已经落在我手里了，所以你最好努力‘歌颂’一下你那位涅墨斯特，我说不定会让你死得痛快些。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback adresse à Ziek un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Tu as entendu ça, misérable ? Je n'en ai pas encore fini avec toi. Désormais, ta vie m'appartient, et tu as intérêt à faire ce qu'on te dit. Discrédite ton Némésite aux yeux de la populace, et j'envisagerai peut-être d'abréger tes souffrances. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback adresse à Ziek un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Tu as entendu ça, misérable ? Je n'en ai pas encore fini avec toi. Désormais, ta vie m'appartient, et tu as intérêt à faire ce qu'on te dit. Discrédite ton Némésite aux yeux de la populace, et j'envisagerai peut-être d'abréger tes souffrances. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, Ziek'e kana susamış bir tavırla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Duydun mu pislik? İşin daha bitmedi. Artık benimsin ve o çok sevdiğin Nemezit hakkında tatlı tatlı şakımayı öğrensen iyi edersin. Belki de bu sayede hızlı bir ölüme hak kazanabilirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback gives Ziek a bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "Did you hear that, wretch? It is not over for you yet. You are mine now, so you had best sing sweetly about your Nemesite. You may yet earn yourself an easy death."
